thread.title: Cfactor Announces Q3 Events and Activities
thread.title_full: Cfactor Announces Q3 Events and Activities - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Cfactor Announces Q3 Events and Activities
text:
HRExaminer Radio Show, IHRIM Annual Conference, HR Technology Conference and Networking / Wine Tasting Reception
(PRWEB) September 08, 2015
cfactor Works Inc. (cfactor), developer of the award-winning Vibe HCM system of engagement, today revealed its upcoming lineup of events and activities for Q3.
cfactor current lineup of engagements include:
 HRExaminer Radio Show (September 9, 2015) - Cary Schuler, Co-Founder/CEO of cfactor Works Inc. will chat with John Sumser about a variety of relevant topics in HR Technology. IHRIM Annual Conference (September 17-18, 2015) - cfactor will be showcasing its Vibe HCM product suite at the IHRIM conference (Booths 605 & 607) in Atlanta, GA. Kevin Sheridan, an Internationally-recognized Key-Note Speaker and New York Times Best Selling Author, will be presenting at our booth Thursday at 2:30 and Friday at 10:30. Also, we will be giving away complimentary signed copies of Kevin's best-selling book, "Building a Magnetic Culture". HR Technology Conference (October 18-21, 2015) - cfactor will be showcasing its Vibe HCM product suite at the HR Technology Conference (Booth 911) in Las Vegas, NV. Visitors are encouraged to stop by and check out a demonstration of Vibe HCM in action and chat with clients that have deployed the application in their organization. Those that wish to schedule a one-on-one demonstration of Vibe HCM are encouraged to email the cfactor team: inquiries@cfactorworks.com Networking / Wine Tasting Reception - cfactor will be hosting an exciting event during the HR Tech conference on October 18th, 7:00 PM. The event will take place at one of the premiere wine bars in North America - the Swan Room & terrace at Aureole Las Vegas in the Mandalay Bay. Michael Moon, Director of Research at Aberdeen, will present key findings from her latest research paper, "Social in HR: Embedding Social into HR Systems and Processes". If you are interested in attending, please email cfactor Marketing team (marketing(at)cfactorworks(dot)com) - space is limited. View excerpts from Michael's report:
 o "How Social Technology is Improving Productivity"
 o "The Age of Social: Toward a System of Engagement"
About cfactor Works
cfactor's Vibe HCM delivers a personalized, interactive HRMS, talent management and employee collaboration suite. Unlike typical HR systems, Vibe HCM is a dynamic hub of employee-focused processes, communications, connections and collaboration - driving efficiency while fostering engagement. As its name implies, Vibe HCM delivers personalized, highly branded experiences tailored to our customer's culture, unique story.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12945164.htm
